cells.data:
-- Applied to a predicate and a list, `all` determines if all elements 
-- of the list satisfy the predicate.

-- all :: (a -> Bool) -> [a] -> Bool
on all(f, xs)
    tell mReturn(f)
        set lng to length of xs
        repeat with i from 1 to lng
            if not |Î»|(item i of xs, i, xs) then return false
        end repeat
        true
    end tell
end all
